name: Death Damnation
storyline:
You are the new graveyard keeper and it’s your first night at the cemetery. Everything goes wrong, dead come out of their grave, ghost are everywhere. The fog is heavy and it seems that you cannot get out of this place. Will you survive this job? Will you find out what’s happening in this place? Will you lose your mind or soul fighting the evil? Each step could be your last.

Death Damnation is a hardcore FPS survival horror game influenced by game like SCP containment breach, Resident evil, Silent hill, Phasmophobia, and Dark souls. We aim to create a new experience in survival horror games, where you find out how to kill paranormal entity and what’s happening there. Explore locations, find new items and crafts. Find how to get rid of the evil like a true improvised Ghost/Monster hunter: Maybe you should use holy water and a crucifix? Or maybe a good old rifle and then burning the corpse?
summary: Death Damnation is a Twitch connected game developed for streamers. You and your community are in charge of controlling the paranormal events and dreadful monsters. Be sure that your viewers are on your side to escape death, otherwise you will have a bad time.
